channel.title: [Help] Sprite Transparency
channel.description:
hey guys, well im customizing my client.. and im wondering..why isnt the transparency showup if i put it into the client? it hows up everywere else, ilke on forums. on my comp, as transparency. its saved in .png format, but no go. can someone please help me ?
heres a pic [img]http://i38.tinypic.com/281vgqw.png[/img]
the white is were its suppose to be transparent
rep++ if u help, thanks:)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 22, 2009, 03:23:55 am[/size][hr]nvm i fixed it FTW
